title: What are the key features of the Micromax 'In' smartphone series to be launched in November 2020? - Quora

response.answer_text: according to me they will launch every type of smartphone , as they also confirmed gaming oriented smartphones , i think below 8k they will be giving g25 types processors , in 15k they will be giving helio g90t types processors. else lets wait for 3 november 2020.
